local_intent: Pull to open the dishwasher hinged door and verify it is open.
assumptions: Handle is already grasped from previous step.
Tool yaw was set to 90 degrees before pulling.
coherence_with_global: Implements the global step 'OpenContainer(dishwasher, hinged_door, 1500)' with pre-checks for grasp and orientation, then verifies door state via ContainerOpen.
